DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine response rate , duration response , survival patient bulky stage IIB stage IIIA non-small cell lung cancer treat paclitaxel , carboplatin , radiotherapy follow surgical resection . - Assess toxicity regimen patient population . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients receive paclitaxel IV 1 hour carboplatin IV 30 minute weekly 5 week . Patients also undergo concurrent radiotherapy daily 5 day week 5 week absence unacceptable toxicity . At approximately 4 week completion chemoradiotherapy , patient stable regressive disease undergo surgical resection . If disease unresectable , patient receive additional 2 week radiotherapy . Patients follow every 3 month 2 year , every 6 month 3 year , annually thereafter . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 29-30 patient accrue study .
